title: Apple Inc. stock underperforms Friday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       slipped 1.00% to $182.52 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.16% to 39,131.53 and the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       falling 0.28% to 15,996.82. The stock's fall snapped a two-day winning streak. Apple Inc. closed $17.10 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       fell 0.32% to $410.34, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       fell 0.02% to $145.29, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       fell 0.09% to $143.96. Trading volume (43.7 M) remained 12.1 million below its 50-day average volume of 55.8 M.
